Package wellington

Class Main

java.lang.Object
wellington.Main
public class Main extends Object
Represents Wellington train main system. Provides information of stations, train lines and service time of Wellington trains. Enable users to track for traveling options, live departure from a specified station. Users can plan journey between two stations.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jam

  • Constructor Details

    • Main

      public Main()
      Main constructor to set up interface. Buttons and text field for user interations.

  • Method Details

    • loadStationData

      public void loadStationData()
      Load station data from station file and store in hashmap.

    • loadTrainLineData

      public void loadTrainLineData()
      Load train line data from files and store in hashmap. Add stations accordingly to train lines.

    • printStationInfo

      public void printStationInfo()
      Print sorted station data.

    • printTrainLineInfo

      public void printTrainLineInfo()
      Print sorted train line data.

    • findTrainLineByStation

      public void findTrainLineByStation​(String stationName)
      Find a train line goes through a station by user's input from text field and print out result.
      Parameters:
      Station - name as a key to search for value in map.

    • listStationsByTrainLine

      public void listStationsByTrainLine​(String trainLineName)
      Find a train line by its name with user's input from text field and print out result.
      Parameters:
      train - line name as a key to search for value in map.

    • getFrom

      public void getFrom​(String a)
      Get starting station from user and keep as a String value for later use.
      Parameters:
      a - passes the String to departing station name to String from in class field.

    • getTo

      public void getTo​(String b)
      Get destination station from user and keep as a String value for later use.
      Parameters:
      b - passes the String to destination station name to the String to in class field.

    • getIndex

      public int getIndex​(Station s, TrainLine tl)
      Helper method to get the index of a station on a specified train line.
      Parameters:
      s - takes station object.
      tl - takes train line object.
      Returns:
      the index for later use in other method.

    • getDepartureTime

      public int getDepartureTime​(TrainLine tl, TrainService ts, Station dep)
      Helper method to get the departure time at a particular station on a specified train line from a train service object, returning time from which has the same index as departing station on the train line.
      Parameters:
      tl - takes train line object.
      ts - takes train service object.
      dep - takes departure station.
      Returns:
      departure time from that station at the given time.

    • getArrivalTime

      public int getArrivalTime​(TrainLine tl, TrainService ts, Station arr)
      Helper method to get the arrival time at a particular station on a specified train line from a train service object, returning time from which has the same index as arriving station on the train line.
      Parameters:
      tl - takes train line object.
      ts - takes train service object.
      dep - takes departure station.
      Returns:
      arrival time from that station at the given time.

    • listLineOption

      public void listLineOption()
      Get traveling options between two stations. The list is initialized when calling this method as it is only used for that search. Get two station objects from station map and track for train lines that run through both stations and store them in a list. Print out result to user with number sequence. This method could also be used for journey planning method.

    • loadTrainServiceData

      public void loadTrainServiceData()
      Load train service data from files and store in hashmap. Add train service accordingly to train lines.

    • searchAtStation

      public void searchAtStation​(String station)
      Method to take station from user input. If the input has a match from station map, store it to a station object from field for later use.
      Parameters:
      station - from user input.

    • listServiceByTime

      public void listServiceByTime()
      Get station from user input using filed parameter. Ask for a specified time from user with helper method. Get index of that station of each train line goes through it. Track train service time at that station by the same index and print accordingly.

    • nextService

      public TrainService nextService​(TrainLine tl, int time, int index)
      A helper method to get the live departure.
      Parameters:
      tl - takes the train line of that service.
      time - takes time stated.
      index - used to get the station from a train line.
      Returns:
      a train service object with given parameters.

    • askTimeDeparture

      public int askTimeDeparture()
      A helper method to ask time from user input. Can be utilized in journey planning and live departure.
      Returns:
      an integer within the service time range.

    • journeyHelper

      public void journeyHelper​(TrainLine tl, int select, int time)
      A helper method that take parameters to get the next service from departing station to destination station through a train line selected by user. Calculate zones traveled between two stations. Prints result to user.
      Parameters:
      tl - takes train line object.
      select - take user selection which is an integer.
      time - take time as an integer from user. Helper methods are used.

    • journeyPlanner

      public void journeyPlanner()
      List train lines select between two stations specified by user with helper method which is also used for line options. Take user selection of train line and again use helper method to get train service.

    • printMapImage

      public void printMapImage()
      Print out train lines and stations in Wellington by loading a png file.

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args)
